thread.title: What do you think of Adele’s new single Hello?
thread.title_full: What do you think of Adele’s new single Hello?

author: Pip Ellwood-Hughes
title: What do you think of Adele’s new single Hello?
text:
Posted on October 23, 2015 By Pip Ellwood-Hughes Music News 
Adele has started the promotion for her new album 25 with the release of the music video for her new single Hello. 
After sending the world into meltdown last weekend when she previewed part of the track during an ad break in The X Factor, Adele confirmed that her new album 25 will be released on 20th November 2015. Hello is the first track taken from the album and the video has been directed by Xavier Dolan. 
Fans of 90210 will spot actor Tristan Wilds as the love interest in the video, which sees Adele walking around a dusty old house and wandering in the country. Tristan appears throughout and you can just about make out some low dialogue spoken by him and Adele during the video. 
Take a listen to Hello and watch the video below, then vote in our poll and tell us what you think.
